Home.title: Hi, I'm Oscar
Home.subtitle: I turn ideas into digital products.

list.name: Nowya
list.description: B2B2C booking platform like Airbnb for beauty, health and pet services.
list.details: Nowya is a B2B2C platform where users can book appointments at barbershops, spas, clinics or veterinary services. It includes public pages for customers and dashboards for businesses to manage bookings and view analytics. Built with Next.js, Shadcn and Tailwind on the frontend, and a microservices backend with NestJS. Integrates WhatsApp notifications via Twilio and runs entirely on AWS.
list.role: Full-stack developer and co-creator (lead on backend, DevOps and admin platform frontend)

list.name: VoluntRed
list.description: Platform connecting volunteers and NGOs. Built for social good.
list.details: I contributed to the development of both the frontend and backend of this platform to help NGOs manage volunteers and campaigns. Focused on accessibility and speed.

list.name: EVA Protect
list.description: Firmware, DevOps and device streaming for a security system startup.
list.details: Led the embedded systems development and cloud infrastructure for a scalable, real-time camera monitoring solution using ESP32-CAM and AWS.

list.name: Fithub
list.description: Mobile app and web platform to create, share, and manage personalized fitness routines.
list.details: Fithub is an all-in-one solution for fitness enthusiasts, trainers, and nutritionists. Users can create their own workout plans, track metrics such as weight, progress, and calories, and explore public routines shared by others. Trainers and nutritionists can assign custom training and diet plans to their clients. I developed both the mobile app (using React Native) and key parts of the backend, including local data management with SQLite and integration with cloud services.

MiniProjects.title: Mini Projects
MiniProjects.subtitle: Some smaller projects I've worked on during my free time and for specific clients.

list.name: Linkhub Express
list.description: Solution for organizing and sharing link collections without authentication requirements.
list.details: Linkhub is a platform that allows users to create, organize, and share collections of links easily without needing to create an account. Users can customize their collections with different themes and categories, and share them through a unique link. The project was built with Next.js, styled with Tailwind CSS, and uses Shadcn components for a modern and responsive interface.

list.name: Studio Fitness 333
list.description: Complete administration panel for a gym with member, class, and payment management.
list.details: I developed a complete management system for Studio Fitness 333, allowing staff to efficiently manage gym members, schedule classes, track attendance, and process payments. The frontend was built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn components for a smooth user experience, while the backend uses Node.js with a PostgreSQL database to store and manage all business information. The system includes features such as report generation, automatic reminder sending, and attendance metrics analysis.

list.name: React Calculator
list.description: An interactive calculator built with React and TypeScript with advanced functionalities.
list.details: This calculator was created as a practice project to improve my skills with React and TypeScript. It includes features such as basic operations, memory, calculation history, and a responsive design.

list.name: Tasks API
list.description: A RESTful API for task management with authentication and authorization.
list.details: I developed this API as part of a personal project to practice backend development. It implements complete CRUD operations, JWT authentication, data validation, and MongoDB connection.

list.name: Memory Game
list.description: A classic memory game built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript.
list.details: I developed this game as a personal project to practice DOM manipulation and game logic in JavaScript. It includes features such as a timer, move counter, and various difficulty levels.

list.name: Discord Bot
list.description: A Discord bot with custom commands and interactive functionalities.
list.details: I developed this bot to learn about the Discord API and create a useful tool for my servers. It includes moderation commands, integration with external APIs, and a user experience system.

About.title: About me
About.intro: I'm a developer passionate about technology, entrepreneurship, and startups. I enjoy building useful, scalable, and user-centered digital products. I'm driven by turning ideas into real solutions that create impact.

education.title: Software Development Technologist
